user_input: Generate the hydrogen demand time‑series for the TYNDP 2026 Netherlands scenario (year 2040), split the demand across model nodes, and create the corresponding TST workbook.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Generate the hydrogen demand time-series for the TYNDP 2026 Netherlands scenario (year 2040).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate function or model element to generate the demand series.

tasks.description: Split the generated hydrogen demand time-series across the model nodes.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the output of 'main_demand_processer_v2', select the appropriate file to modify and split the demand across nodes.

tasks.description: Create the TST workbook for the hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 Netherlands (year 2040).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the modified demand files, generate the TST workbook as required.
